column4: how do I install xgl on ubuntu.. I just need someone to do the trigger to give me that link
I have just installed xgl... https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CompositeManager/Xgl and then when installed, follow the link at the end of the page to install a composite manager

did you get it? installation is very easy if you follow that link... I just don't understand how can I set fonts and theme correctly, but it works! and make sure that you add all plugins with compiz to have all the visual effects
